subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Tim Cahill scored in injury time as Australia rescued a 1-1 draw against Oman in its opening Asia Cup match in Bangkok. Cahill, a midfielder who plays for Everton of the English Premier League, volleyed into the net from close range for Australia. Oman took the lead in the 32nd minute on a strike from Badar Mubarak.
